fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -You may perform the factional mafia kill

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-For the purposes of lore this role is treated as having a white rose in their pocket
-This role hates @mrnubslair and is obligated to attack them first, or else they are modkilled.
-If you perform the factional mafia kill, another mafia killing will do so if they exist.
